choose.when: where title like or content like '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' or writer in (select userid from member where name like '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%')
where writer in (select userid from member where name like '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%')

mapper.insert: insert into board( title, content, writer ) values( #{title}, #{content}, #{writer} )
mapper.select: select b.* from ( select row_number() over(order by id) no, name, b.* from board b left outer join member m on b.writer = m.userid ) b where no between ${beginList} and ${endList} order by no desc
